TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Mechanoid Heat Armor
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Changes the heat armor mechanoids have, if you leave the setting at the max value (which is the vanilla default) then it'll be ignored.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Disable Mechanoid Adaptation
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Disables the ability for Mechanoids to adapt to EMP, so EMP remains super effective regardless.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Pre-1.0 Ship Parts
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Returns psychic and defoliator ship parts to their B18 state where they actually provide a decent reward. Psychic Ship Part Leavings: - 100x Steel - 35x Plasteel - 8x Steel Slag - 4x Industrial Components - 1x Spacer Components - 1x AI Persona Core Defoliator Ship Part Leavings: - 100x Steel - 35x Plasteel - 8x Steel Slag - 4x Industrial Component - 1x Spacer Component - 5x Glittertech Medicine

TweaksGalore.TweakSubSectionDef.label: Better Gloomlight
TweaksGalore.TweakSubSectionDef.description: Changes the gloomlight often found in mech clusters to produce more light so it's actually useful.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Enabled
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Changes the gloomlight often found in mech clusters to produce more light so it's actually useful.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Work As Sunlamp
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: With Better Gloomlight and this enabled, they'll instead produce enough light to be equal to that of a free sunlamp.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Darklight Glow
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Changes the colour of the gloomlight to match that of 'Darklight'.

TweaksGalore.TweakSubSectionDef.label: Player Mechanoid Stats
TweaksGalore.TweakSubSectionDef.description: Allows the changing of work stats for player mechanoids so they don't suck nearly as much.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Enabled
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Allows the changing of mechanoid stats, useful for disabling if there's any compatibility issues.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Energy Drain Rate
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Controls the rate at which mechanoid energy drains.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Skill Level
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Controls the skill level all mechanoids have (vanilla is universal like this, it's weird).
